entry.title: Ukraine Fears Defeat in East Without Surge in Military Aid
entry.content: Russia is advancing in the Donbas region as the U.S. and its allies prepare to discuss new heavy-weapons supplies for Kyiv.

entry.title: Mexico Takes Aim at Private Companies, Threatening Decades of Economic Growth
entry.content: Populist President Andrés Manuel López Obrador is seeking to reclaim state control over the oil-and-gas and electricity sectors. “It’s a closing off of Mexico.”
